languages.text: "Ты поступил опрометчиво. Люди все равно обречены — их наверняка коснулась скверна Хаоса".

traits.locale_text: "Ты поступил опрометчиво. Люди все равно обречены — их наверняка коснулась скверна Хаоса".

languages.text: "You acted rashly. Those people are doomed anyway — they are probably already infected with the corruption of Chaos."
languages.original_text: "Ты поступил опрометчиво. Люди все равно обречены — их наверняка коснулась скверна Хаоса".

traits.locale_text: "You acted rashly. Those people are doomed anyway — they are probably already infected with the corruption of Chaos."
"You acted rashly. Those people are doomed anyway — they are probably already infected with the corruption of Chaos."
"You acted rashly. Those people are doomed anyway — they are probably already infected with the corruption of Chaos."
"You acted rashly. Those people are doomed anyway — they are probably already infected with the corruption of Chaos."

languages.text: “你的行为太草率了，毕竟那些人反正都完蛋了。他们很可能已经被混沌的腐化感染了。”
languages.original_text: "You acted rashly. Those people are doomed anyway — they are probably already infected with the corruption of Chaos."

traits.locale_text: “你的行为太草率了，毕竟那些人反正都完蛋了。他们很可能已经被混沌的腐化感染了。”

languages.text: «Actuó con precipitación. Esa gente está condenada de todos modos, probablemente ya estén infestados por la corrupción del Caos».
languages.original_text: "You acted rashly. Those people are doomed anyway — they are probably already infected with the corruption of Chaos."

traits.locale_text: «Actuó con precipitación. Esa gente está condenada de todos modos, probablemente ya estén infestados por la corrupción del Caos».

languages.text: 「軽率な行動だったな。あの者たちはいずれにせよ破滅していた。彼らはすでに、渾沌の腐敗に感染していたのだろう」
languages.original_text: "You acted rashly. Those people are doomed anyway — they are probably already infected with the corruption of Chaos."

traits.locale_text: 「軽率な行動だったな。あの者たちはいずれにせよ破滅していた。彼らはすでに、渾沌の腐敗に感染していたのだろう」

languages.text: "Ihr habt voreilig gehandelt. Diese Leute sind ohnehin dem Untergang geweiht – wahrscheinlich sind sie bereits mit der Korruption des Chaos infiziert."
languages.original_text: "You acted rashly. Those people are doomed anyway — they are probably already infected with the corruption of Chaos."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt voreilig gehandelt. Diese Leute sind ohnehin dem Untergang geweiht – wahrscheinlich sind sie bereits mit der Korruption des Chaos infiziert."

languages.text: « Vous avez agi de manière inconsidérée. Ces gens sont condamnés. Il y a fort à parier que la corruption du Chaos les a déjà infectés. »
languages.original_text: "You acted rashly. Those people are doomed anyway — they are probably already infected with the corruption of Chaos."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez agi de manière inconsidérée. Ces gens sont condamnés. Il y a fort à parier que la corruption du Chaos les a déjà infectés. »

languages.text: "Aceleci davrandın. O zavallıların kaderi zaten belli. Kaos'un yozluğu onlara çoktan bulaşmıştır."
languages.original_text: "You acted rashly. Those people are doomed anyway — they are probably already infected with the corruption of Chaos."

traits.locale_text: "Aceleci davrandın. O zavallıların kaderi zaten belli. Kaos'un yozluğu onlara çoktan bulaşmıştır."
